title: Is Donald Trump more intelligent today than Adolf Hitler used to be? - Quora

response.answer_text: Read Hitler’s speeches and letters. He was SMART and stayed on message. He also had a solid platform based on combating the results of losing WW1 and the Depression. Donald is an idiot. He cannot stay on message — he has no message. He has no plan for growth, or to sustain the budget. Unlike Hitler, who was proud of German Social Programs, Donald couldn’t care less about the average person. Donald cares about Donald and boasting how great he is. Hitler thanked people, and routinely reminded them that he had humble beginnings — was one of the normal people … and he routinely thanked “providence” for lifting him up. Also, Hitler improved over time. He learned and demonstrated that learning. In the early days, he wrote “Mein Kampf” — but he did so with a basic education and, as he once reminded his audience, he wasn’t a lawyer or other highly trained person and so it is foolish to measure his early work against more credentialed people. But, measured against Trump. Hitler knew the leaders of other countries, and the backgrounds of their staff. He also made references to history obscure analogies which only the more educated and intelligent would have been able to work into their speeches. And he did so without talking down to anyone. Compared to Hitler, Trump’s IQ is sub-zero.

Absolutely; Hitler was a charlatan opportunist and fanatic, little more. Ironically, Trump understands Austrian economics better than Hitler, who was an actual Austrian (but that didn’t stop fellow Austrian Arnold Schwarzenegger, who also trashed California’s economy using similar economic sophistry). Trump knows the limits of taxation vs. inflation, and how “less is more” when it comes to optimizing an economy. Trump also understands true leadership through personal power vs. position-power; i.e. appeal vs. removing heads, and so he understands that persuasion is better than force. So in terms of intelligence; as Forrest Gump said “stupid is as stupid does;” i.e. it’s how well he does the job that counts. And so far, he’s doing pretty well. In contrast, Hitler killed the Golden Goose by controlled economy and a foreign policy of pure aggression, under a reign of terror. Good thing we dodged “Bloody Hillary.”
